mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with correct punctuation: My favorite fruit s are apples, oranges, bananas., My favorite fruit s are apples, oranges, and bananas., My favorite fruit s are apples, oranges, and, bananas., None of these

options.a: My favorite fruit s are apples, oranges, bananas.
options.b: My favorite fruit s are apples, oranges, and bananas.
options.c: My favorite fruit s are apples, oranges, and, bananas.
